SELECT smi.id, smi.CODE, smi.batch_record, smi.package_set, smi.brand, smi.del_flag, smi.create_date, smi.STATUS, smi.supplier_id,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit, FROM supplier_materials_info smi LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = smi.supplier_info) LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.`code` = smi.`code`) WHERE 1 = 1
AND mi.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.materialsName},"%")
AND si.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
AND smi.STATUS = #{queryForm.status}
ORDER BY smi.create_date DESC

SELECT smi.id, smi.CODE, smi.batch_record, smi.package_set, smi.brand, smi.del_flag, smi.create_date, smi.STATUS, smi.supplier_id,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit, FROM supplier_materials_info smi LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = smi.supplier_info) LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.`code` = smi.`code`) WHERE 1 = 1 AND smi.supplier_id = #{supplierId} ORDER BY smi.create_date DESC
